Enchanted Galio remeinds me a lot of:

https://68.media.tumblr.com/fb42d4e3fe5d1e3ba2123c192e4bfb3d/tumblr_mvlmlh6rkT1sltzfro1_500.gif

Coincidence?

I have to say,this is....unexpected.

Like seriously,he looked so omnious and mysterious in the previous teaser,but here he looks like a super hero who loves to show off.

Personally I love it,because I love over the top characters,but I'm pretty sure that there are gonna be people who are disappointed about this.

Also I really love the design of the enchanted Galio.

I kinda dig the idea that this shows a Galio after the point in his narrative that we see him in on live.

Like, Galio as we know went from being a guardian and failing his duties to slinking in to depression, finding purpose through the inspiration of Poppy and then working towards penance. Updated Galio is after this point, having worked hard to protect Demacia, having people believe in him and build up his confidence, to where he now wholly believes in himself and feels self assured that he can protect Demacia. 

I can really dig that idea, though as you said, it's a big shift and likely won't see it's share of controversy.

This Galio seems more like an asshole. Old Galio was the epitome of Gentle Giant. His kit, his model, and his personality are completely different; he is a whole other champion entirely. The only thing that saves this as a rework for me is if they include a traditional skin. I mean, sure it looks fun and I like it. But galio is pretty much deleted. It would have been nice to have more of his original personality intact.
Do keep in mind we've heard...what three lines of VO from him? And a laugh? Once his VO's available we'll have a better assessment of his personality.

Im one of those who is dissaponted by the look of the new galio, the old one looked like a monster with those batlike wings and claws... in fact, due that he was one of the first characters that i used.

However, i must admit that the new one actually looks like a creation of a Demacian. Even if i dont like the new wings, those ARE the actual wings of the emblem of Demacia... and that is a pretty cool detail. And the crown is really similar to the one of Jarvan in his original splash art.

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/0/04/Demacia_Crest.png/revision/latest?cb=20161117052357

Holy shit. I'm wholly astounded and confused by all of this.

He looks absoluetly amazing!

I do wonder about his personality though. Indicates a shift in where his narrative's at, depending on how much has changed.

The personality change is a bit unsettling. I'll need to watch it again. He seems to have a lot of bravado which the original Galio didn't really have. 

I know personalities change in reworks, but Galio had a more established personality than Poppy before the update. He wasn't exactly over confident, rather very focused on his penance. 

And I should have noticed this before, but I don't like the color scheme in game. Marble and Gold?  I'm too used to blue and gold. 

"Wings" are interesting though.

Well I can tell you one thing: 

Nobody will ever not know he's from Demacia ever again. :D

The Blue/Gold looked a LOT better in the splash art than it did in game.

Seriously that thing that we used to call Galio was a bright-teal mess.
Can't really argue with that.
Enchanted Galio has a blue/gold theme now, which is nice

Yeah, he looks more like a statue of justice now than a gargoyle; I don't like. >.< I want my blue and gold back! Without it, he just isn't Galio anymore.

I can see the personallity shift as an advancement of his character in terms of personal narrative; this Galio went through the same stuff as old Galio, but he's now proved himself to the people and himself, protected that which he wanted to protect, and has had his sense of self worth elevated. 

Will need to hear more of his VO and see his bio, but I'm kinda digging the change. I can appreciate a Galio who's more self assured; I mean he certainly has the size and power such that I wouldn't blame him for bigging himself up.

Holy shit that ult though. They better have that sonic boom sound in the game. Looks satisfying as hell.

I will agree that the personality shift is odd... he really does come off as some cocky superhero type character. I guess it's supposed to be in contrast to Sion's "fuck everything I just want you dead" personality. 

Let's wait for more lines though.
So Sion is the 90's Anti-hero to Galio's cocky hero?

Not sure if anyone has addressed this yet, but why the marble color rather than Galio's typical blue-gray stone color?

Don't get me wrong, he's cool, I'm just...confused.
He's made out of the Anti-Magic stone in Demacia, Which is white. You can see it in a lot of there architecture on the universe website. It's what gives him his anti-magic properties.

The initial reaction to any VGU is often shock that so much has changed. Players usually get used to the new champions pretty quickly. But the white color does look *different*. Could you at least release him with a Chroma Skin with the old color scheme? It wouldn't be a Traditional Skin, just a Chroma. And by chance you could also do a "Buy Chromas with IP event" during the first week he is released. It would be a happy coincidence.
Would you ever consider doing a traditional skin for {{champion:3}}  like karma and trundle? only saying this because I'm going to miss the old {{champion:3}}  voice :(
